member.name: MIDIINCAPS
member.summary: The MIDIINCAPS structure describes the capabilities of a MIDI input device.

member.name: MIDIINCAPS.wMid
member.summary: Manufacturer identifier of the device driver for the MIDI input device. Manufacturer identifiers are defined in Manufacturer and Product Identifiers.

member.name: MIDIINCAPS.wPid
member.summary: Product identifier of the MIDI input device. Product identifiers are defined in Manufacturer and Product Identifiers.

member.name: MIDIINCAPS.vDriverVersion
member.summary: Version number of the device driver for the MIDI input device. The high-order byte is the major version number, and the low-order byte is the minor version number.

member.name: MIDIINCAPS.szPname
member.summary: Product name in a null-terminated string.
